summary: Build a server-creation app with a domain selector and a paid-plugins section including a purchase flow (QR code, redeem code, direct payment).
architectural_notes: Paid plugin purchase options are non-real/fake flows (random QR code; redeem accepts any code; direct payment is recharge-style without real processing).

existing_features.title: Update the server creation dialog domain suffix selector to offer exactly these options: .org, .net, .fun, .gg, .play, .host, .xyz, .com, and ensure the selected suffix is saved onto the created server record.
Add a new "Paid Plugins" section in the Plugins page that shows a catalog of paid plugins (add many entries) and allows users to start a purchase flow from each paid plugin card.

Implement the paid-plugin purchase flow with three options: (1) QR code option that displays a randomly generated fake QR image each time it is opened/refreshed, (2) Redeem Code option that shows an input field and accepts any entered code as successful redemption, and (3) Direct Payment option that simulates a recharge-style payment and marks the plugin as purchased after confirmation; persist purchased/owned paid plugins per server so they remain owned after page reload.

Extend the server data model and localStorage persistence to include owned/purchased paid plugins in a backwards-compatible way (existing saved servers without the new field must continue to load without crashing).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add domain selector option during server creation (e.g., .org, .net, .fun, .gg, .play, .host, .xyz, .com).
Add paid plugins section with many plugins and a purchase flow offering: (1) fake/random QR code, (2) redeem code input where any code is accepted, (3) direct payment/recharge-style option.

projectName: Add domain suffix selector and paid plugin purchase flow
